content: Create authentication types and schemas for family registration/joining
Set up Supabase auth hooks and utilities for authentication state management
Create form components (Input, Label, Form) needed for auth forms
Build main auth page (/auth) with login/register toggle
Create family registration form for parents to create new families
Create family joining form for members to join with family codes
Implement protected route system with auth guards
Create API integration functions for family creation and joining
Add role-based access control and UI differences for parents vs children
Implement profile management to link Supabase auth with users table
Add loading states, error handling, and success feedback throughout auth flows
Update middleware.ts for route protection and auth redirects
